settings.headline: Hangovers Solved
settings.body: Blowfish is the morning hangover remedy that actually works. The formula is backed by science, FDA-recognized and guaranteed to make you feel better in about 15 minutes.

settings.headline:
yeah, we’re the drug
company that parties
How Does It Work?
settings.body: Just drop two tablets in water and drink. Blowfish is real medicine specifically formulated to relieve hangover symptoms. The effervescent tablets rapidly deliver maximum-strength pain reliever and pharmaceutical-grade caffeine to your hurting body, while being gentle on your stomach. So don’t worry. Everything’s gonna be okay.

settings.headline: Our Hangover-Free Guarantee
settings.body: We believe that Blowfish is the best hangover remedy out there. If you buy it and don’t agree, we’ll give you your money back. Just email us at nonbeliever@rallylabs.com and tell us where you got it, how much you paid, and what works better.

settings.question: Does Blowfish really work?
settings.answer: Yes. If you’ve ever tried another "hangover cure” we understand why you’re skeptical. But Blowfish is different. For one, our formulation is recognized by the FDA. Seriously. You can go to the FDA’s website here and search our NDC code 75920-0464. For another, we guarantee you like it or we’ll really give your money back.

settings.question: When should I take Blowfish?
settings.answer: In the morning, as soon as you wake up. Unless you really want that hangover to last any longer.

settings.question: What's in Blowfish?
settings.answer: Each Blowfish tablet contains 500mg of aspirin and 60 mg of pharmaceutical caffeine in two effervescent tablets. We know what you’re thinking: sounds simple. And it is. Blowfish gives you everything you need to feel better quickly: pain reliever, caffeine, effervescence and water. Just drop the tablets in water, wait for them to dissolve and drink. We’ll take it from there.

settings.question: Why is Blowfish better than aspirin and a cup of coffee?
settings.answer: Blowfish is specifically formulated for people with hangovers. That means it’s designed to work fast and be gentle on your stomach. Effervescent tablets work twice as quickly as regular pills. And the medicinal caffeine and effervescent solution are easier on your stomach than coffee, which has been shown to be a strong producer of stomach acid. Not exactly what your stomach needs after a night of getting pummeled by alcohol.

settings.question: I’m allergic to aspirin or another NSAID (such as Advil®), can I still take Blowfish?
settings.answer: No, please don’t. Read the drug facts carefully and do not take Blowfish if you are allergic to any of its ingredients.

settings.question: How much caffeine is in Blowfish?
settings.answer: Two tablets contain 120 mg of caffeine, which is about as much as a regular cup of coffee. If you’re caffeine sensitive, we recommend starting with just one tablet.

settings.question: Is Blowfish vegan, kosher, non-GMO, and gluten-free?
Will Blowfish allow me to drink limitless amounts of alcohol and feel amazing the next day?
settings.answer: No. Blowfish is formulated to alleviate the symptoms of hangovers, even strong ones. But if you’re vomiting and can’t keep it down, unfortunately we can’t help with that. But good luck.

settings.question: Why is it called Blowfish?
settings.answer: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Because it has bubbles? Plus, our research shows it’s one of the only names that hungover people could remember.

settings.question: Where can I buy Blowfish?
settings.answer: The best deal on Blowfish is buying on our website (free shipping!). Do it now. Next time you wake up hungover, you’ll be glad you have it. But if you need it right now, you can also find it in the pain reliever aisle at CVS stores. It’s usually on a bottom shelf. Sometimes it’s hard to spot, and employees might tell you it doesn’t exist, but don’t believe them. It’s there.

settings.body: For the bachelorette party. Guest welcome bags. And general wedding survival--it's the Blowfish Party Box. This Big Day MVP comes packed with 25 individually wrapped doses of our FDA-recognized hangover formula. And with 25% off, you can be sure you, and all your guests, have the hangover protection you're definitely going to need.
